reviewText: This was given to a friend.  It was exactly what she wanted and I purchased it and gave it as a gift.

Although pushing 25 years old, the program is very solid and easily approachable.  The format of 5 one hour classes explains in sufficient detail and easy to understand format the basics of Kabbalistic thinking as espoused by Rav Berg and the Kabbalah Center.  Taking the viewer through the history of Kabbalah and the basic teachings, including a very enlightening view of "Satan", the tapes will make the viewer think and understand much better the basics of modern Kabbalah.
